website_summaries.verdict: This highly rated product is recognized for its exceptionally pure ingredients and emphasis on safety.
pros: Each capsule contains nearly 100% high-purity biotin
Does not include fillers, binders, wheat, or dairy
cons: Contains rice flour, which some customers perceived as a dishonest attempt to add fillers to the capsule

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: After having my second baby, my hair fell out way more than it did with the first. Mind you I don’t have a lot of hair to begin with. I have been taking the Biotin supplement for two months now and the amount of new baby hairs I have growing is unbelievable! This is the best supplement I have found to date! I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I dont put reviews generally but this product is amazing.I've completed half the bottle and I have seen visible difference in my skin. I had dry black spot on my hand which didnt go away even after trying the best of moisturizers. The spot has gone now, my skin is smoother than before and my dead toe nail came came out and a clean new nail is coming. My hair is softer too but I'm applying other things on my hair as well. . I would highly recommend this product .Best buy ever and will buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Anuroop

customer_reviews.title: Great for hair recovery from illness's
customer_reviews.text: I'm a cancer survivor and now a covid19 survivor, and with both illness's I lost hair, with cancer my hair never grew back the same. And now with the covid19, my hair started falling again after recovery. I read about these and took the chance and ordered them, two weeks of use and I notice my hair stronger and growing evenly and fuller. My hair became very brittle after covid19, and I can say that this made my hair stronger. I feel safe taking these.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Great for those that want longer, natural nails!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of the Biotin supplements! I've been doing research for a while for the right supplement to strengthen my nails. Eu Natural has been my first candidate and I plan on sticking with them! My nails have broken far less frequently and have remained flexible, yet stronger! I'm just about done with my first bottle and have already ordered a second (:
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Russell

customer_reviews.title: I have had a really good experience with these so far
customer_reviews.text: If you need hair and nail help then this is it. I have had a really good experience with these so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plant based
customer_reviews.text: Had been looking for a plant based supplement for a long time now!! I finally found one that works. Easy to swallow and you get a lot for what you pay for. Doesn’t taste bad just doesn’t really have a flavor. Highly recommend to all my friends
customer_reviews.author: Mochi

customer_reviews.title: Worked for nails
customer_reviews.text: Haven't noticed much improvement with my hair or skin but after only 2 weeks my nails were long and strong. I've been taking them for a month now so I would expect to see some hair improvement. It's not healthier or fuller but it does seem to be growing faster. I'll keep taking them because my nails are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Natural and made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: I bought these Biotin pills because of all the great reviews I read. I just started taking them so I'm looking forward to the results soon. I've been taking Spring Valley Biotin pills for a few years now and I don't feel they worked much at all. So I'm glad I've switched to a more natural pill and made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Quality & Quanity
customer_reviews.text: I love these Biotin capsules! Why I love them: -generous supply (you only have to take one daily - they are small enough to take without water (easy to swallow) -they have quality, natural ingredients -I’ve been taking these daily for about 3weeks & have noticed my hair is healthier & I’m excited to watch it continue to grow

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Hair is the Ultimate Goal

I ordered my first bottle and I'm looking forward to seeing the end results! Plus eunatural has the cutest packaging on their bottle and they are vegetarian too!

customer_reviews.title: I think it really works!!
customer_reviews.text: I buy vitamins not really putting a lot of faith in them that they'll work, but im always willing to try. I have to say I am really impressed with this company. When I stopped going to the nail salon because of covid-19 and I had to get the gel off of my nails it basically ruined them for a couple of months. I started taking the biotin pills in April. I just ordered my second bottle. My nails have been brittle and paper thin my entire life and im almost 50 now. After taking these pills my nails have never felt so strong or grown so fast. A bonus for me is that the capsule is vegetarian.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa R

Not sure why my hair started falling out but this product has been a great tool in making it healthy again and I will continue to use it

I used to take Nature’s Bounty vitamins, but I tend to run out quickly and was looking for an alternative. I came across Eu Natural biotin vitamins and decided to give it a try. After 2 weeks, I can tell there’s a difference. My hair takes a very long time to grow, but this time it grew a couple inches longer! Will definitely recommend to others.

Also my stepdaughter recently had a haircut where the stylist took off way too much length. I directed her to the Eu Naturel Biotin and her hair grew back twice as fast. This stuff really works. And I like that its vegan.

customer_reviews.author: Joni Long

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great results for hair and nails. Do keep the bar code on the bottle just in case the label changes again. I just about freaked out when I thought it had cancelled. I will continue to purchase this product ... love the way my hair and nails have grown.
customer_reviews.author: Cee_Cee

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. Using for about two months and I think it works.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

product_meta.title: BIOTIN 5000 mcg – Healthier Hair Growth, Stronger Nails, Glowing Skin – 120 Vegetarian Soft Capsules
feature_bullets: HEALTHY HAIR GROWTH – Pure Biotin to support healthy hair, glowing skin, and strong nails.
FULL 5000 MCG STRENGTH – Get the full dose of the Biotin vitamin necessary for your beautiful hair. The powerful vitamin supports your hair health from the inside.

99.8%+ PURITY – Each capsule is formulated with high purity Biotin that others can't match. You can have the confidence that every capsule has the strength and potency that you are looking for in a product.
LAB CERTIFIED PURITY – We blend all our products at a cGMP Certified Laboratory to ensure strict standards and a contaminant-free product. We wouldn't have it any other way and neither should you.
#1 VOTED! Biotin is an important component of enzymes in the body that break down fats and carbohydrates. Improve hair health, enhance skin and support nails all at the same time.

PURE NATURAL FORMULA – 100% vegetarian easy-to-swallow soft capsules, completely free of fillers, binders, and artificial ingredients. No gluten, wheat, or dairy. And of course, never tested on animals. Just a pure and tested product.

100% HAPPINESS & HEALTH and 1-FOR-1 MATCH – We create powerful blends of herbs, vitamins, and minerals, each formulated to promote the best in health. Try our products without worry because we're confident that you will see results and be thrilled with your purchase. And through our Vitamin Angels 1-for-1 Match program, one bottle equals one year of vitamins for a child in need.
